values: Oh, That I May Never Loiter on My Heavenly JourneyOh, That I May Never Loiter on My Heavenly Journey

In spite of the terrible external hardships that Brainerd knew, he pressed on and even flourished under his tribulations that led to the kingdom.In spite of the terrible external hardships that Brainerd knew, he pressed on and even flourished under his tribulations that led to the kingdom.
